comment: Larisch is the best the ECET program has to offer, but unfortunately is half-retired at the moment. If he's offering a class you need at some point, TAKE IT cause he's gonna do a much better job than Asgil or Ali. He's a fun guy with reasonable HW and tests, and is happy to talk if you're struggling

Professor is hilarious, is a great speaker, and explains everything very well. The class work is very easy, but do not miss an assignment or quiz under any circumstance. A couple bad grades could get you close to failing, and he doesn't do make up unless it's for extenuating circumstances. Class was enjoyable and we talked a lot.

The class is tough and there is a lot of coursework but the teacher is fantastic. He goes well out of his way to make sure the students have access to all the materials they need to understand the subject.

Worst professor Ever. He will loose your work and when he asked you to turn it back in he forgets to put in even though you rememind him multiple times. In lab we did all the work and turned everything in on time. But he still find a way to give me a zero for something I have done which is not fair. A lot of people can agreed he is just give zeros

Larisch was good during the beginning of the semester but as the semester progressed he goofed more and we had to learn the material ourselves. Also the other reviews of his upper level is true and I observed it in this class. I wouldn't recommend taking him unless you have to due to class availability.

He has no filter so if you are offended by inappropriate language, you have to deal with it. He's a funny professor and does care about this class. Just show up and do the work for the class and you should be fine and get an A.

his biggest goal, it seems, is to make you see that teamwork matters. Don't miss 3 days. Be on your classmates good side. And yes he is very comfortable speaking the way he wants to. no filter. he is also good about having deaf students.

If i die soon I want Scott Larisch to be one of my pole bearers so he can let me down one last time. Be warned Larisch's high rating here is from his low level classes, which he actually does care about and teach well. I feel like with this class he was forced to teach it, and in-turn puts forth the absolute minimum effort in teaching it.
A very funny prof. ,if you don't get offended. Class is pass or fail miss four or more and you fail

I didn't learn nothing from this professor, I have to read the book and teach myself. he always try to make things harder and always send you back to the book when you ask questions. He makes a lot of mistake on writing the test and most time refuse to correct them or regrade the test. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR IF YOU HAVE THE CHOICE...

I've taken his class before for Fundamentals and he was a very good professor and i learned a lot so i figured he'd be the same for E2, i was wrong. He missed like 2 weeks straight and expected us to teach the material to yourself. I can honestly say i learned nothing in there this semester.

Larisch is a hard ass, and likes to use colorful language. He's very strict and keeps his word on how he'll grade your homework. Homework is a MUST, based on 15 points each. The Academic Bowls are great study guides for his tests. Also, he's a horrible lab instructor as he doesn't do much instructing. Great personality and will make you laugh hard.

If you have virgin ears, do not take this class.If you enjoy a prof teling you to get the F outta class(but he doesnt mean it)then you'll love Prof Larisch. He'll go off on tangents about sticking your bare feet in dog sh*t and letting it squish between your toes. Absolutely an amazing and helpful professor!You'll learn and have a great deal of fun

Awesome professor. He has a passion for teaching what he loves himself. He is currently getting a PhD in Power grid I believe and if there is a better prof. then him, please share with me. I had a great time in his class. Loves when you shout out questions during class, just be careful you can get him off on tangents/subject when you do so.

DO NOT TAKE HIM FOR FUNDAMENTALS! Guy has gotten a lot harder. He grades the homework very strict. 6-8 question tests. Me and a peer where comparing him to another prof and the other prof is much easier on homework and tests. If you take him make sure to do well on all 3 tests. Lets you correct test grades though for 1/2-1/3 credit.

Very cool guy, talks alot about his personal life, funny. All you have to do to make an A is write down a few notes in class about what he said, and just do the journals. Also do not miss more than 3 days or you fail.

I did both Fundamentals adn Orientation with Prof. Larisch.  interesting individual I thought, the first Orientation class I had... Journal entries due every class and mini assignments, will say tho, know your classmates, I'm serious and so is he... he may do some crazy stuff =) but he's wise and wants us to do well, so listen keenly hmmm k =)

Great professor, I read the other comments and I can admit that they are right in many aspects.  Prof. Larisch truly likes what he does, believes we can and wants us all to succeed.  Very helpful and lenient at times.  Once you are a good student, doing the work, asking questions, making an effort, then you will get along perfectly fine with him.
Orentation. Easy class. Just keep up with the note book. VERY HELPFUL. very fun guy. Will deff take in the future
He is a great teacher. He knows that we (non EE majors) only need to know a basic understanding of the class. He goes pretty in depth in some areas of the class; but overall it wasnt that bad.

Very good teacher, he will have you laughing learning, and enjoying class all at the same time. He broke everything down very well, he follows his schedual on the syllabus very closely. He lets you make and uses your own formula sheets on tests and the final

I would certainly recommend Prof Larisch for ECET. He will tell you up front what he expects from you, and then he follows it all the way through. He does take up homework, but the tests come from the book. He is willing to use any example if he thinks it will be of help and will explain material for your future classes too. Take him if you can!

Definitely a prof. you want to take.  Funny guy, really cares about the success of students.  However, does not grade on any curve and collects all homework. This is just to make sure you understand the material.  At first I thought the class would be an easy A but he definitely gave me a run for my money!
class is usless is you can read the text, it all very straight forward. kool guy helps whenever he can even in my other classes. he is extremely knowledgible in electrical engineering

Awesome Fundamentals professor. A little strict on doing homework but it's for your own good. His class is definently not a free A, but if you do the homework and follow along, It's very possible. I've seen students who had other professors for fundamentals struggling in the higher level classes and struggling w/ basic concepts. I'm not! take him.
Among the best in the dept.Displays stong command of the material and educates students very well.Assignments and exams are concise.Nice guy and funny too.
He's a little out there but you will love his class. He even helped me with homework from other classes that i was having trouble with.
He does make you work, but how can you not like this guy?
Very funny man and very easy. We had no quizzes or test in this class. Just a few easy homework assignments. Very good man !! Recommend him !!
He is picky, and requires a lot of Homework, but he is a good teacher, very heplful.
Great professor!  He is willing to help anyone regardless if you are in his class or not.  Classes are as fun as possible considering the subject.
Great Prof!! Highly reccommended!
Goes waaaay out of his way to help students.  Doesn't tolerate failure.  Very nice unless you do something that peeves him.  If you're a hard worker, he will see you through.
His tests can be challenging, but you will learn a lot in his class!  He makes it fun.
He always have a problem timeing his test. It is imposible to complete his test in a given time.
Great man! awesome...always there.
No Comments
He is very easy to understand. His tests are challenging, but not impossible. If you do the work, it's easy studying with him.
No Comments
No Comments
Top notch teacher.  This is the kind of professor you hope you get.  Very personable and goes way, way out of his way to help each and every student.  THIS guy deserves a raise.
Great professor and advisor! Always willing to help even if not in his class.  Strong recomendation for ECET students!
No Comments
